mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_date, b.update_date, u.user_id, u.nickname from board b left join user u on b.user_id = u.user_id where board_id = #{boardId};
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_id, title, content, create_date, user_id) values (#{boardId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{userId})
